org.switchyard.component.common.composer

Class BaseRegexContextMapper<D extends BindingData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.switchyard.component.common.composer.BaseContextMapper<D>
      • org.switchyard.component.common.composer.BaseRegexContextMapper<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - the type of binding data
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextMapper<D>, RegexContextMapper<D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CamelContextMapper, HttpContextMapper, IndexedRecordContextMapper, JMSContextMapper, MappedRecordContextMapper, RESTEasyContextMapper, SOAPContextMapper, StreamableRecordContextMapper

    public class BaseRegexContextMapper<D extends BindingData>
extends BaseContextMapper<D>
implements RegexContextMapper<D>
    Base class for RegexContextMapper; adds the regex pattern matching ability.
    Author:
    David Ward <dward@jboss.org> © 2012 Red Hat Inc.
